content:
My personal photography site and first full scale, independent web project.

Written exclusively in JavaScript, CSS and HTML, the site features parallax scrolling with a dynamically scaled background; custom layouts for mobile, landscape and web; and contact form handling with PHP.

The Library is a React app showcasing my personal reading lists.

The book list content is dynamically rendered through calls to the Google Books API with application state management via Redux and Redux Toolkit. An integrated reader allows book previews with a fullscreen option. Carousel list scrolling adds easy browsing.

Fifty React Apps is a re-visioning of the udemy online course 50 Projects in 50 Days.

Iâ€™m recreating each project into a React component to serve both as a toolkit for future projects and to hone my React and JavaScript skills. The containing project serves as a UI for browsing completed apps and features a smooth transition dropdown menu. Currently 2/50 complete.
